reviews.productTitle: ThunderWay Single Pole Decorator Wall Light Switch with Wall Plate, 15A 120V/277V, On/Off Paddle Switch, Residential Grade - UL Listed, White (10)
reviews.text: Changed out the old stick light switches at my family home, couple of which were at least 50 years old. Aside from some minor modifications to allow the decorator plates to be screwed on two old metal electrical switch outlet boxes embedded in the concrete wall, the rest of the installation went smoothly.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2024
reviews.title: Reasonable price for the lot

reviews.productTitle: ThunderWay Single Pole Decorator Wall Light Switch with Wall Plate, 15A 120V/277V, On/Off Paddle Switch, Residential Grade - UL Listed, White (10)
reviews.text: Great quantity in this set. I used it to remove switches with timers the previous owner installed which kept going off at random times and I wasn’t able to edit the time. Comes with its own wall plate or you can use yours. I have a lot left over for future moves so I’m very happy
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2023
reviews.title: Perfect size and good set
